text: Hi everyone, I'm building a website and finding the use of CTAs a bit cumbersome. What would I lose if I use the button module instead?
We basically link to some landing pages also on HubSpot.

Well, it depends what you want to use them for. Essentially you’re going to lose that impression/click tracking on a per button basis. Say for example you have 5 buttons on the HP all linking to a landing page - If you use the button module for them all you’re not going to know which button they clicked. There are ways around this, though such as adding some additional URL vars.
